name: RevisedLevelCells
description: Revise level cells just a smidge.

compactEditorLevels.name: Compact Editor Levels
compactEditorLevels.description:
<cl>Original code by Cvolton.</c>

Compacts your editor levels in "My Levels" menu.

<cy>Due to how this feature is implemented, enabling this option also disables selecting multiple levels for deletion.</c>

levelDescriptions.name: Level Descriptions
levelDescriptions.description:
View level descriptions without opening the level's page, like with level lists. (Formerly part of ErysEdits.)

<cy>Does not apply to levels in the "My Levels" menu.</c>

recolorSongLabels.name: Recolor Song Labels
recolorSongLabels.description:
<cl>Original idea inspired by Xiyxs.</c>

Color song labels based on their source (Default, Newgrounds, Music Library, NCS).

defaultSongColor.name: Default Songs Color
defaultSongColor.description: Set this to <cj>(40, 210, 255)</c> to keep the original color for levels that use default songs.

newgroundsColor.name: Newgrounds Songs Color
newgroundsColor.description: Set this to <cd>(255, 130, 255)</c> to keep the original color for songs from Newgrounds.

recolorNCS.name: Also Recolor NCS Songs
recolorNCS.description: Differentiate NCS Songs from Music Library songs.

cycleThroughColors.name: Cycle Through Above Colors
cycleThroughColors.description:
If a level contains multiple songs, cycle through the colors you've selected above.

<cy>This will only happen when viewing online levels you have saved and GD hasn't forgotten about.</c>

songCycleSpeed.name: Color Cycling Speed
songCycleSpeed.description: Sets how quickly (lower value)/slowly (higher value) the song label changes color if <cl>"Cycle Through Above Colors"</c> is enabled.

recolorLevelNameFeaturedScore.name: Recolor Level Name based on Featured Status
recolorLevelNameFeaturedScore.description:
Recolor a level's name based on its Featured status (Rated, <cy>Featured</c>, <co>Epic</c>, <cp>Legendary</c>, <cj>Mythic</c>).

Will fade between white (the default color) and the corresponding color for its featured status.

blendingText.name: Readable Labels (Better Blending)
blendingText.description: Some mods add additional text to a LevelCell. Some of these texts uses the <cl>chatFont font (the one seen in comments)</c>, which makes them difficult to read against thumbnails from <cl>cdc's Level Thumbnails mod</c>. Enabling this makes these texts more readable.

removePlacement.name: Remove Level List Placement
removePlacement.description:
<cp>REQUIRES THE "COMPACT LISTS" MOD BY CVOLTON.</c>

Remove the placement numbers from LevelCells when viewing level lists.
<cy>Much like Cvolton's code, this feature will move the percentage label to the left of the</c> <cl>"View"</c> <cy>button.</c>
